errors.error_description: Suggests using incorrect command 'python setup.py install --force' which may not work properly
correction_candidates: To get started quickly, run `pip install gsutil` to install gsutil with all required dependencies.
To get started quickly, run `python -m pip install gsutil` to install gsutil with all required dependencies.
To get started quickly, follow the official installation guide at the link above for proper setup.
To get started quickly, run `pip install google-cloud-storage` to install gsutil with all required dependencies.
errors.golden_answer: To get started quickly, run `pip install gsutil` to install gsutil with all required dependencies.
